titleStmt.title: The ball A comedy, as it vvas presented by her Majesties Servants, at the private House in Drury Lane. Written by George Chapman, and Iames Shirly.
titleStmt.author: Shirley, James, 1596-1666.
Chapman, George, 1559?-1634.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Cotes, for Andrew Crooke, and William Cooke,

notesStmt.note: In fact probably by James Shirley alone.
The authors' names are bracketed together on the title page.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
